rooms.name: Entrance Hall / Living Area
rooms.description: Spacious entrance area combined with a living room that follows contemporary design. Features an open plan layout allowing natural light and air circulation in line with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Modern dining space adjacent to the living area, designed for family gatherings and social interaction.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Comfortable guest bedroom ensuring privacy. Incorporates modern finishes and ample storage space.

rooms.name: Primary Bedroom Suite
rooms.description: Master suite with attached en-suite bathroom, walk-in closet, and peaceful ambiance following Vastu guidelines for personal well-being.

openings.description: Wide entryway to the ground floor living area promoting an inviting atmosphere.
Large windows providing ample natural light and ventilation in keeping with contemporary design and Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: Compact but well-equipped gym space designed for personal fitness, ensuring privacy with sound insulation.

rooms.name: Study / Home Office
rooms.description: Functional study area integrating modern technology and efficient storage solutions.

rooms.name: Balcony / Terrace Garden
rooms.description: Open balcony space transformed into a small garden, promoting fresh air circulation and connection with nature in accordance with Vastu principles for relaxation.

openings.description: Safe and accessible staircase connecting both floors. Designed to be unobstructed in accordance with local building norms.
Access doors leading from the interior to the garden balcony, ensuring a seamless transition between indoor and outdoor living spaces.

family_composition.note: Designed with family functionality in mind including private areas for personal space, common areas for family gatherings, and ample open spaces to ensure a harmonious balance between work and relaxation.

notes: This floor plan adheres to local building norms of India, considering safety, privacy, and cultural design elements. The integration of a private gym, garden terrace, and open plan living areas supports both the physical and mental well-being of the family.
